** 9 《子罕篇第九》

9.1子罕言利與命與仁。

# src: LY 09.02; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_009-2a>¶

拜下，¶
禮也；¶
今拜乎上，¶	KR1a0021_006:39b:4:18:0,KR1d0027_025:5a:8:24:1,KR1d0028_009:8a:6:28:1,KR1d0030_007:18a:4:17:0,KR1d0033_025:10a:6:2:23,KR1d0086_082:7a:2:8:65,KR1g0005_007:26a:10:18:171,KR1g0009_005:1b:8:18:2,KR1h0004_009:2a:16:1:3,KR1h0005_005:1b:5:3:0,KR1h0006_005:3a:1:7:6,KR1h0006_005:3a:8:16:6,KR1h0006_005:3b:1:24:6,KR1h0007_009:2b:1:4:6,KR1h0007_009:2b:5:34:6,KR1h0012_005:2b:5:18:8,KR1h0015_005:1b:4:16:4,KR1h0017_009:4b:7:18:16,KR1h0019_002:17b:8:18:48,KR1h0020_002:23b:4:18:130,KR1h0021_000:104b:10:18:458,KR1h0024_007:7b:7:30:4,KR1h0024_010:2a:3:33:4,KR1h0026_005:2a:5:18:9,KR1h0028_005:22a:10:22:54,KR1h0028_008:3b:1:5:13,KR1h0030_003:3b:7:29:5,KR1h0034_008:3b:5:5:13,KR1h0038_009:2b:8:5:13,KR1h0039_001:35a:3:3:151,KR1h0039_005:37b:12:16:105,KR1h0043_009:4a:7:5:12,KR2a0009_066:15a:5:1:5,KR3a0047_025:36a:3:6:19,KR3a0059_008:25b:6:18:6,KR3a0059_012:1b:8:8:2,KR3a0080_040:13a:2:2:72,KR3a0105_094:5a:5:14:57,KR3a0108_012:17a:7:6:26,KR3j0009_010:8a:9:18:6,KR3j0009_026:8a:9:18:226,KR3j0021_013:21a:3:16:1,KR3j0021_014:10a:6:16:1,KR3j0072_006:22a:8:4:25,KR3k0012_542:3b:8:10:4,KR3k0012_999:3b:8:10:12380,KR3k0013_747:8a:8:17:4,KR3k0025_054:34a:5:6:16,KR3k0025_055:43b:1:17:36,KR3k0029_157:33a:3:12:4,KR3k0055_159:50b:1:33:17,KR4d0254_011:24b:4:18:1,KR5h0033_021:014a:4:9:14
泰也。¶
雖違眾，¶
吾從下。」¶

# src: LY 09.04; tr. CH
<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_009-4a>¶
9.4子絕四：¶
毋意，¶
毋必，¶
毋固，¶
毋我。

# src: LY 09.05; tr. CH

9.6大宰問於子貢曰：¶

# src: LY 09.10; tr. CH
9.10子見齊衰者、冕衣裳者與瞽者，¶
見之，¶
雖少，¶
必作；¶
過之，¶
必趨。

# src: LY 09.11:01; tr. CH

曰：¶
「久矣哉，¶

9.16子曰：¶

9.17子在川上，曰：¶

9.18子曰：¶

# src: LY 09. 21; tr. CH
9.21子謂顏淵，¶
曰：¶
「惜乎！¶

9.24子曰：¶

未可與權。」<pb:KR1h0004_CHANT_009-32a>¶¶	KR1a0008_011:6a:3:17:1,KR1a0020_006:34a:7:11:0,KR1a0021_004:16b:3:2:0,KR1a0027_003:10b:3:3:0,KR1a0033_005:30a:2:17:2,KR1a0035_002:28b:6:4:2,KR1a0041_047:17b:2:2:0,KR1a0047_030:5b:4:15:1,KR1a0056_014:11a:3:7:1,KR1a0081_008:25b:8:2:0,KR1a0085_003:15a:8:13:0,KR1a0090_003:82a:5:5:19,KR1a0092_011:99b:7:3:9,KR1a0136_009:46a:1:17:1,KR1a0139_053:31a:2:7:315,KR1a0139_080:27a:8:10:373,KR1a0157_002:40b:8:2:31,KR1b0013_017:15a:4:9:0,KR1b0018_033:5b:6:19:0,KR1b0018_036:17b:4:6:1,KR1b0019_010:1b:8:10:1,KR1b0020_006:2a:1:6:1,KR1b0024_007:13b:8:15:16,KR1b0027_004:19a:3:29:24,KR1b0029_006:22b:5:22:34,KR1b0037_006:32b:4:16:48,KR1b0046_012:46b:3:36:70,KR1b0054_001:30b:1:6:385,KR1c0004_023:41a:4:38:3,KR1c0024_005:26b:7:20:1,KR1c0027_007:14a:3:19:189,KR1d0057_089:17b:1:15:0,KR1d0057_129:39a:4:7:1,KR1d0060_017:13b:5:2:5,KR1e0012_000:7a:8:1:81,KR1e0013_001:9a:7:20:6,KR1e0023_002:41b:5:19:0,KR1e0023_002:42a:4:20:0,KR1e0031_003:4b:1:18:1,KR1e0033_001:15a:3:9:2,KR1e0067_001:5b:4:2:2,KR1e0093_000:25b:3:20:198,KR1e0094_001:18a:1:20:13,KR1g0004_003:13b:2:2:51,KR1g0009_005:10b:4:2:2,KR1g0009_013:21a:7:10:37,KR1g0018_001:24b:3:1:45,KR1g0018_001:24b:6:12:45,KR1g0018_001:25a:1:8:45,KR1g0018_001:25a:8:13:45,KR1h0004_009:12a:121:1:33,KR1h0006_005:19b:1:13:29,KR1h0006_005:20a:3:41:29,KR1h0007_009:16a:9:7:28,KR1h0007_009:17a:1:36:28,KR1h0008_001:18a:7:6:111,KR1h0008_001:18b:9:2:115,KR1h0008_001:19a:2:14:116,KR1h0012_001:14b:3:17:43,KR1h0012_005:14b:2:2:52,KR1h0012_005:14b:10:6:54,KR1h0015_005:8a:3:13:4,KR1h0016_037:1b:2:8:5,KR1h0017_009:42a:10:2:170,KR1h0017_009:43a:8:11:172,KR1h0017_009:45b:7:11:174,KR1h0017_009:46a:3:20:175,KR1h0019_002:33b:11:2:104,KR1h0020_002:30a:4:2:166,KR1h0020_002:30a:8:11:167,KR1h0021_000:116b:11:2:510,KR1h0022_004:24b:1:2:37,KR1h0024_010:13b:4:20:4,KR1h0024_029:15a:3:25:4,KR1h0026_005:15a:6:2:61,KR1h0026_005:15b:5:7:62,KR1h0028_008:26b:4:3:87,KR1h0028_008:28b:1:26:88,KR1h0031_018:9a:2:6:28,KR1h0031_018:9a:4:10:28,KR1h0032_000:10b:10:1:112,K 9.31「唐棣之華，¶
